languages.text: "Я слышал, что в соседнем отсеке нехватка рук. Направим наш трудовой запас туда. В кандалах, если потребуется".
"I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."
languages.original_text: "Я слышал, что в соседнем отсеке нехватка рук. Направим наш трудовой запас туда. В кандалах, если потребуется".

traits.locale_text: "I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We're going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."
"I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We're going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."
"I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We're going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."
"I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We're going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."
"I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."
"I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."
"I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."

languages.text: "Mir wurde gesagt, im nächsten Modul gibt es zu wenige Arbeiter. Wir werden unsere Arbeitsreserven dort einsetzen. Wenn nötig in Ketten."
languages.original_text: "I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."

traits.locale_text: "Mir wurde gesagt, im nächsten Modul gibt es zu wenige Arbeiter. Wir werden unsere Arbeitsreserven dort einsetzen. Wenn nötig in Ketten."

languages.text: « J'ai cru comprendre que la baie d'à-côté manque de bras. Nous allons y déployer notre réserve de main-d'œuvre. En enchaînant les récalcitrants, si nécessaire. »
languages.original_text: "I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai cru comprendre que la baie d'à-côté manque de bras. Nous allons y déployer notre réserve de main-d'œuvre. En enchaînant les récalcitrants, si nécessaire. »

languages.text: «Me consta que en el compartimento contiguo escasea la mano de obra. Destinaremos allí a los trabajadores que tenemos en reserva. Con grilletes, si fuese menester».
languages.original_text: "I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."

traits.locale_text: «Me consta que en el compartimento contiguo escasea la mano de obra. Destinaremos allí a los trabajadores que tenemos en reserva. Con grilletes, si fuese menester».

languages.text: 「隣のベイが人手不足だと聞いています。そこに労働力の余剰を配置するつもりです。必要であれば、手かせ足かせを着けさせてでも」
languages.original_text: "I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."

traits.locale_text: 「隣のベイが人手不足だと聞いています。そこに労働力の余剰を配置するつもりです。必要であれば、手かせ足かせを着けさせてでも」

languages.text: “我听说隔壁甲板的劳动力短缺，我们可以将我们的储备劳动力部署在那边。如果需要的话，可以给那些人戴上镣铐。”
languages.original_text: "I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."

traits.locale_text: “我听说隔壁甲板的劳动力短缺，我们可以将我们的储备劳动力部署在那边。如果需要的话，可以给那些人戴上镣铐。”

languages.text: "Bana sonraki bölmede iş gücü eksiği olduğu söylendi. İş gücü rezervimizi oraya yerleştireceğiz. Gerekirse prangaya vuracağız."
languages.original_text: "I've been told the next bay has a labour shortage. We are going to deploy our workforce reserve there. In shackles if need be."
